branches.name: RS Puram Branch
branches.address: 12 Race Course Road, RS Puram, Coimbatore-641002

personal_loan.name: Personal Loan
personal_loan.eligibility: Above 21 years, Minimum income of 50,000 per month, Stable employment
personal_loan.documents: Aadhar card, PAN card, Income proof, Employment letter

home_loan.name: Home Loan
home_loan.eligibility: ABove 750 CIBIL score, Minimum income of 50,000 per month
home_loan.documents: Aadhar card, PAN card, Income proof, Property documents

car_loan.name: Car Loan
car_loan.eligibility: Above the age of 21, Minimum income of 30,000 per month,Valid driving license
car_loan.documents: Aadhar card, PAN card, Income proof, Vehicle quotation

education_loan.name: Education Loan
education_loan.eligibility: Admission in recognized institution, Minimum age of 18 years, Co-applicant required
education_loan.documents: Aadhar card, PAN card, Admission letter, Income proof of co-applicant

modi_scheme.name: Modi Scheme
benefits: Training programs for modern farming techniques
modi_scheme.application: Visit any CGBank branch with your farmer ID and land documents

pm_farmer_scheme.name: PM Farmer Scheme
benefits: Direct cash transfers to eligible farmers
Assistance for purchasing seeds and equipment
pm_farmer_scheme.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with land holdings up to 2 hectares
pm_farmer_scheme.documents: land ownership documents, Aadhar card, PAN card, Bank account details

thangamagal_scheme.name: Thangamagal Scheme
thangamagal_scheme.application: Visit any CGBank branch with ID proof and business plan
thangamagal_scheme.documents: Aadhar card, PAN card, Business registration documents

student_account.name: Student Account
student_account.features: Zero balance account, Special education loans, Discounts on student services

nri_account.name: NRI Account
nri_account.features: Foreign currency support, Global banking, Higher interest rates

senior_account.name: Senior Citizen Account
senior_account.features: Higher interest rates, Priority services, Special pension benefits

regular_savings_account.name: Regular Savings Account
regular_savings_account.features: Free ATM withdrawals, Online banking, Monthly statements

atm_info.name: RS Puram Branch
atm_info.address: 121 Geetha Hospital Road, RS Puram, Coimbatore-641002

greetings: Hello! I'm Rexa, your personal banking assistant at CGBank. How can I help you today?
Welcome to CGBank! I'm Rexa, here to assist you with all your banking needs.
Hi there! I'm Rexa, your intelligent banking assistant. What can I do for you?
balance_inquiry: Let me check your account balance for you.
transaction_history: I'll show you your recent transaction history.
Let me pull up your transaction records.
fund_transfer: I can help you transfer money. Please provide the recipient details.
Let me assist you with fund transfer.
I'll guide you through the money transfer process.
bill_payment: I can help you pay your bills. Which bill would you like to pay?
Let me assist you with bill payment.
I'll help you process your bill payment.
thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
Happy to help! Let me know if you need anything else.
Glad I could assist you! Anything else I can do for you?
account: i can help you to create a bank account

visa_platinum.name: Visa Platinum Credit Card
visa_platinum.rewards: 5% cashback on groceries, 3% on fuel, 1% on all other purchases
visa_platinum.benefits: Travel insurance, Airport lounge access, Purchase protection
visa_platinum.activation: Call 1800-123-4567 or visit netbanking to activate
visa_platinum.hotlisting: Call 1800-123-4567 immediately if card is lost/stolen

rupay_classic.name: RuPay Classic Debit Card
rupay_classic.rewards: Discounts on fuel and railway tickets
rupay_classic.benefits: Domestic use only, Low cost transactions
rupay_classic.activation: Call 1800-123-4567 or visit ATM to activate

fund_transfer.description: Transfer funds between your accounts or to other bank accounts
fund_transfer.limits: Up to 1,00,000 per transaction, 5,00,000 daily limit
fund_transfer.processing_time: Instant for CGBank accounts, 1-2 hours for other banks

bill_payments.description: Pay utility bills, credit cards, and other payments

card_management.description: Activate new cards, set limits, block lost cards
card_management.limits: Can adjust daily limits up to card maximum

investment.description: Open fixed deposits, recurring deposits, and other investments

loan_application.description: Apply for personal loans, home loans, and other products
